ComicInfo.Title: Issue 8
ComicInfo.Summary: Italians and Yakuza form a truce, but jackie without knowing it goes and kills some of their men.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-23 22:37:07. [CVDB118659]
ComicInfo.Inker: Edwin Rosell, Joe Weems, John Livesay, Kevin Conrad Hanna, Marco Galli, Richard Bennett
ComicInfo.Colorist: Dean White, Greg Hammond, Matt Nelson, Quantum Color FX, Richard Isanove
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dean White, Joe Benitez, Joe Weems, Marc Silvestri
ComicInfo.Characters: Darkus, Frankie Franchetti, Jackie Estacado, Jake McCarthy, Kenneth Irons
ComicInfo.Teams: Darklings, New York Police Department, The Franchetti Family, Yakuza
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State, United Nations Headquarters
